group_1.textCenter: Thank you everyone.@I'm ready to defeat the Witch.
(The hope I've gathered from Magical Girls@has far exceeded my expectations.)
(Will building a bridge to the future be enough@to repay their feelings…?)
(...I may not be able to overturn the despair@of the past.)
(But I do hope I can save them,@in whatever small way I can…)

group_1.narration: The Magical Girl's legend began when I encountered@you before you became a Witch.
Right now, I think you're afraid. So much so that you feel@forced to create a world where only you can prosper.
Still, perhaps creating a future where Magical Girls@can live happily is another form of prosperity.
With that, your hope will be fulfilled.
And beginning from your hope,@everyone else's hopes will connect to the future.
[flashEffect:flashWhiteSlow1]So it's time for you to begone@from history and Iroha's soul!
[flashEffect:flashWhiteSlow2]There's no longer any need for you@to further taint yourself in despair!

group_1.textCenter: (The roots that have been growing inside of me@are fading away…)

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry, Mikoto.
I tried to save the Magical Girls of the past@as well.
But in the end, I just caused a lot of trouble for@everyone, and it all ended in such a mess…
I couldn't fulfill my promise to you…

group_1.textRight: You can't change the past.@We established that from the very start.
Thus the hope of Magical Girls swallowed@in despair…
…can become little more than a bridge@that keeps the future alive.
Still, you managed to slightly alter the fates@of those doomed to sorrow.
…Truth be told, I'm not as surprised@as I expected.
Give Yachiyo my thanks.

group_1.textCenter: What a relief… The Automatic Purification@System has been restored.

group_1.textRight: Iroha…!

group_1.textLeft: *Gasp*
Yachiyo…@You're back to normal…?

group_1.textRight: After borrowing everyone's power, I defeated@the Witch, and my original form was restored.
Enough about me, though.@Are you alright…?

group_1.textLeft: Yes. The Witch within me has vanished.
It seems like it's also disappeared from the@Magical Girls of the past as well.
And Mikoto wanted me to tell you…
Thank you for keeping the hope of Magical Girls@of the past alive.

group_1.textRight: I'm just glad we could make a future that@doesn't end in despair.

group_1.textLeft: I'm super glad we were right nearby!

group_1.textCenter: I'm so relieved you guys are safe…

group_1.textLeft: All's well that ends well, yeah!
Sorry for causing you guys so much trouble…

group_1.textRight: Honestly, Iroha, shouldn't we be giving you@a big lecture?
Yes… While I know you're reckless…
I mean, it's bad enough that you put the APS@on the line.
Why did you even think of going back in time@in the first place?
I don't want to chastise you, but you caused@more than a little inconvenience this time.

group_1.textLeft: I know, you're right…

group_1.textCenter: Wait a second! Iroha was being considerate of@the Magical Girls of the past.

group_1.textRight: Actually, it's Touka and I who were responsible@for this.

group_1.textLeft: We're the ones who exploited Big Sister's@feelings.
…Huh?

group_1.textRight: Simply put, we manipulated Big Sister.
We just wanted her to be happy…

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry, I have no idea what you guys are@trying to get at…

group_1.narration: "Ui will be the core of the Automatic Purification@System, Big Sister will maintain the coating@covering the earth, and userName will be the hub@which forms the connection between the two."
"But fundamentally, that would mean sacrificing@your freedom so you can be bound to the Automatic@Purification System via the Magia Record, no?"
"Perhaps Big Sister and Ui were aware of this@and had been prepared, but in our eyes, they@did a poor job of concealing their loneliness."
"Hence we vied to find a way to return@their normal lives to them once more…"
"Resulting in our invention of the Soul Vessel."
"As you all know by now, the Soul Vessel is@a wondrous tool allowing the transportation@of matter from one space to another."
"With it, it was now possible to remove@their Soul Gems from the Magia Record@while still keeping them within it."

"That simply left the matter of Big Sister's concept,@which had been whittled away in the present day.@If we could retrieve its bits and pieces@from everyone and restore it, Iroha and Ui@would once again be recognized by all,@and they could return to their lives."
"But if we were to inform Big Sister and Ui@of our plan, they would likely grow worried…@Resultantly, they might not have accepted@the matter and instead maintain the status quo…"

"Under that reasoning, Touka and I concocted@a mission to gather the records of Magical Girls@in the past. While Big Sister and Ui were away,@Touka and I worked to gather Iroha's concept@which was scattered about in the present day."
"But it turns out we made@a grave miscalculation!"
"Thanks to that, it seems Big Sister's@concept itself collapsed altogether…"

group_1.textRight: …And that explains everything.
All of this occurred because of us.

group_1.textLeft: So please don't be mad at Big Sister and Ui.

group_1.narration: [chara:101404:effect_shake]*Smack*

group_1.textRight: Urgh…

group_1.narration: [chara:100703:effect_shake]*Smack*

group_1.textLeft: Nyah…

group_1.textCenter: While other people might not feel any better@knowing your intentions…
This was all an accident stemming from@your feelings for Iroha, right?

group_1.textRight: I apologize…

group_1.textCenter: Then I suppose it all comes down to Iroha's@current condition.

group_1.textLeft: There's no problem at all, then.
You completed the concept recovery we were@trying to do, Yachiyo!
W-wait a sec!@Doesn't that mean…?!

group_1.textRight: Are Iroha and Ui going to come back soon?!
Yo, Iroha! You guys gotta hurry up and split!
And then you can come out, right?!@Ui, too!

group_1.textLeft: AHHH! STOOOOOP!
If this goes wrong, the Automatic Purification@System will be broken! We can't do it yet.

group_1.textRight: Our last step is to return to the Rumor of the@Eternal Sakura and verify things.

group_1.textLeft: Touka… Nemu…@Is everything you said true…?

group_1.textRight: Hurray! We can all be together again, Sis!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah… I can't believe it…
As I thought, Lady Touka and Lady Nemu@are beyond extraordinary… Hagumun…

group_1.textRight: Yeah, they operate on such a huge scope that@even their blunders are on a scale of their own…

group_1.textLeft: I feel like all the hardships we underwent@in the past have been left in the dust…

group_1.textRight: We got to return the favor to Tamaki,@but I dunno what to say…
But still, now Ui and I can talk about@Mr. Purrs-a-Lot again.

group_1.textLeft: We gotta celebrate their comeback!

group_1.textRight: Before that, however, I simply hope that this@final verification succeeds without a hitch.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.@I want to see you both in good form again.
Once you guys are back safe and sound,@let's hang out sometime!

group_1.textRight: That's right.@We're all waiting for you.

group_1.textLeft: Though Nanami might be the one who most@eagerly awaits you.
…Yachiyo.

group_1.textRight: As it is, I understand Touka and Nemu's plan,
so I'll wait and hope for your safe return.

group_1.textLeft: I can't wait to return to Mikazuki Villa again…

group_1.textRight: We'll see you soon, Iroha.

group_1.textLeft: I'll see you soon, too, Yachiyo.
And Touka, Nemu…@Thank you.

group_1.textRight: I know we certainly put you through@the wringer.

So to make up for that, we gotta make sure@we ultimately pull this off. [chara:100703:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100703:cheek_0][chara:100703:face_mtn_ex_011.exp3.json][chara:100703:lipSynch_1]*Giggle*

group_1.progressNarration: All Magical Girls meet a fate of sorrow.
That giant Witch, towering like a castle,@had almost brought about a far@more gruesome conclusion, but@Iroha and Yachiyo were able@to overturn that fate.
"Even if the life of a Magical Girl@ends in despair, someday, her hope@will be carried to the future."
The legend passed down through@Magical Girls worked like a prophecy@to create the future, as it awaited@the final miracle.
For a time, Iroha disappeared@with Touka and Nemu into the@Rumor of the Eternal Sakura...

group_1.narration: *Ding♪* *Dong♪*

group_1.textRight: Huh? Are they back?!

group_1.textLeft: I can't believe they showed up on the same day@as our sleepover!

group_1.textRight: I-I have to change clothes right away…!

group_1.textLeft: Don't worry about it!
Yes, let's greet them together!

group_1.textRight: |Was omitting that from Iroha and Ui truly@the right thing to do?|
|They won't be able to return to the Magia@Record, correct?|

group_1.textLeft: Had we said as much, they would never leave.

group_1.textRight: |But if you insist on this arrangement, then the@Automatic Purification System will destabilize.|

group_1.textLeft: That's fine, even so.

group_1.textRight: While it is our dearest wish that Magical Girls@be rewarded for their efforts...
That is contingent on our sisters' happiness.

group_1.textLeft: So it doesn't matter if everyone hates us or not.
The happiness of those two is our number one@priority.

group_1.textRight: I suppose that's how it is. *Chuckle*

group_1.textLeft: Indeed it is. *Giggle*

group_1.textRight: Wow! There's the scent of Mikazuki Villa again!@It's been a while!

group_1.textLeft: It really brings back memories.

group_1.textCenter: Oh, let me brew us some tea…!

group_1.textLeft: Lemme help you out!

group_1.textRight: Me too!

group_1.textLeft: Before anything else, go change your clothes.@I'll prepare the tea.
Iroha, you sit here and relax.

group_1.textRight: Sure thing.

group_1.narration: I mean, I already feel relaxed just by walking in.@Mikazuki Villa is my home now…
But still, what is this feeling…?
Maybe it's because I'm still tethered to the Magia Record,@but I think I can faintly hear the voices of Magical Girls@calling out to me from all over the world.
Even now, I'm sure their impurities are being collected,@and everyone who has been saved will move forward@into the bright future that awaits us.
And from now on,@Ui and I will be here in Mikazuki Villa.
So we'll all go into the future together.@Yachiyo, Tsuruno, Felicia, Sana, and the both of us.
I hope I'm allowed to have at least that for now.

group_1.textLeft: Tea's ready. [chara:100201:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:100201:cheek_0][chara:100201:face_mtn_ex_051.exp3.json][chara:100201:lipSynch_1]What's wrong?@You have a strange look on your face…

group_1.textRight: Oh no, it's nothing.@[chara:100101:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100101:cheek_0][chara:100101:face_mtn_ex_011.exp3.json:motion_200][chara:100101:lipSynch_1]Let's do our best together from now on.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* What's this about?@[chara:100201:lipSynch_0][wait:1.7][chara:100201:cheek_0][chara:100201:motion_0:eyeClose_0][chara:100201:lipSynch_1]Yeah, I'd like that.
